## Derivative practice

Problem 1
```{r}
expr1 <- expression(x^2)
deriv1 <- D(expr1, "x")
x <- 3
eval(deriv1)

```

Problem 2

```{r}
expr2 <- expression(2 * (3*a + 2)^4 - 5)
deriv2 <- D(expr2, "a")
a <- 1.2
eval(deriv2)
```
